client_description_Summary_Note:
The RM has known Koskinen Virtanen Järvinen since childhood, as their families have been close friends for many years. This long-standing relationship has fostered a deep trust and understanding between them.
Koskinen Virtanen Järvinen is a 25 year old Research Scientist from Finland.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons he decided to join.
client_description_Family_Background: Koskinen Virtanen Järvinen is currently single. He does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
Koskinen graduated from Kiteen lukio in 2019.
Koskinen completed his university studies at University of Turku in 2023.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Koskinen Virtanen Järvinen is a 25 year old and comes from Finland.
In 2023, Koskinen Virtanen Järvinen started working as a Research Scientist at Fimmic Oy, marking the beginning of his successful career.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
While working, he saved 10000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
Client does not have any properties.He inherited 2600000 EUR from his grandmother, a well-known Tech Entrepreneur, in 2015, allowing him to expand his investment portfolio.
client_description_Client_Summary: In summary, Koskinen has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
